definitions.definition: A region in eastern Guangdong , China , home of the Teochew people. Historically composed of 8 counties belonging to the department of Chaozhou ( 潮州 府 ), today it is equivalent to the 3 cities of Chaozhou , Shantou , and Jieyang .

main_definition: A region in eastern Guangdong , China , home of the Teochew people. Historically composed of 8 counties belonging to the department of Chaozhou ( 潮州 府 ), today it is equivalent to the 3 cities of Chaozhou , Shantou , and Jieyang .
